tool_description: External system will integrate with wss
name: external-system
title: external-system

api_list.name: connected
api_list.description: when a client connects to the wss
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://external-system.p.rapidapi.com/connected"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "external-system.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
